title: Digital Marketing Course by UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become an expert in SEO, Social Media Marketing, Google Ads, Content Strategy, Email Marketing, and Analytics. Learn hands-on digital marketing tools with real-time campaign practice and placement support.

afterCompleted.title: Job Opportunities After Digital Marketing Course
afterCompleted.description: Digital Marketing professionals are in high demand across IT, startups, e-commerce, education, and branding agencies. After completing this course, you can apply for:

whychoose.title: Complete Marketing Curriculum
whychoose.description: Covers SEO, SEM, SMM, Google Ads, YouTube, Email Marketing, Content Strategy, and Analytics.

whychoose.title: Live Campaign Practice

whychoose.title: Industry Tools Mastery
whychoose.description: Hands-on learning with Google Analytics, Search Console, Canva, SEMrush, Mailchimp, and more.

whychoose.title: Hands-On Assignments

whychoose.title: Expert Digital Marketers

faq.question: What is Digital Marketing?
faq.answer: Digital Marketing refers to promoting products and services online using SEO, social media, ads, content, and email marketing strategies.

faq.question: Is this course suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes. No prior experience is needed. We start from the fundamentals of marketing and digital platforms.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: You will learn Google Analytics, Search Console, Google Ads, Canva, Keyword Planner, SEMrush, Facebook Ads Manager, and more.

faq.question: Do you provide job assistance?
faq.answer: Yes! UNIQ Technologies provides 100% placement support with interview preparation.

faq.question: Will I work on live projects?
faq.answer: Yes. You will run real Google Ads and Social Media campaigns under trainer guidance.

faq.question: Can I switch between online and offline?
faq.answer: Yes, you can attend in any mode anytime.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: The course duration is 1 to 1.5 months depending on batch type.

faq.question: Do I get certificates?
faq.answer: Yes. You will receive both Course Completion and Internship Certificates.

faq.question: Is Digital Marketing in demand?
faq.answer: Yes! Every company requires digital marketers, making it one of the fastest-growing career fields.
